stripped_text: When you score this agenda, add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D. Draw X cards, where X is equal to the number of cards you added to R&D this way. If the Runner has at least X cards in the grip, they add X cards from the grip to the bottom of the stack at random.
text: When you score this agenda, add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D. Draw X cards, where X is equal to the number of cards you added to R&D this way. If the Runner has at least X cards in the grip, they add X cards from the grip to the bottom of the stack at random.
title: Reeducation
